speak.voice: Good morning to you too Amber!
It's such a nice weather today. Oh, it's Elizabeth by the way.

Perfect. We're all here - shall we begin?
Where did we leave off last time?
I think we managed to share the report with the customer.
And what was their feedback? Was it positive?

They outlined a few concerns but overall it was very positive.
They did mention they would like a follow up meeting to cover the Machine Learning part.

Sounds good. We can certainly accommodate that. Brandon is our resident ML expert.
Brandon, can we run an overview session of our ML offerings on Azure?

Certainly. I can prepare an overview of our Azure Machine Learning offering and also cover the Cognitive Services.
Do we know the timelines we need to work against?
